posts.title: Soft and Hard

posts.title: Dr Pomerantz
posts.excerpt: Last film by Assi Dayn.Dr. Yoel Pomerantz, 64, is an unemployed clinical psychologist who lives in poverty with his 30 year old son Yoav in a 12th floor apartment. Pomerantz volunteers at ANA, the psychology hotline and is an expert at dialoguing with potential suicide callers. Occasionally he suggests that they come to his clinic …

posts._title: Shigehiro Ozawa – Tosei-nin retsuden AKA Yakuza’s Tale (1969)
posts.title: Tosei-nin retsuden
posts.excerpt: SynopsisA yakuza member embarks on a trail of revenge for his murdered boss. Senzo, the successor of the Mita Family, searches for the man bearing a tattoo of a dragon who is said to be responsible for the death of their former leader. – Letterboxd

posts.title: Iconoclast
posts.excerpt: Quote:Boyd Rice may well be the only person alive who’s been on a first name basis with both Charlie Manson and Marilyn Manson. posts.title: The Crime of Doctor Hallet
